apierror-discussiontools-commentname-amb: Lahabaya balibu din mali yuli ŋɔ '$1' nyɛla di ni bon nyɛ shɛli, <var>commentid</var> nyɛla din niŋ talahi.
apihelp-discussiontoolsedit-param-commen: ŋmahan gbaŋ din nyɛn n deei labsigu ŋɔ.zaŋ n tum tuma di<var>paction</var>nyɛla<var>addcomment</var>yaɣabu<var>commentname</var>.
Yɛltɔɣili yuli shɛli a ni yan labisi. Only used when <var>paction</var> is <var>addcomment</var>.
apihelp-discussiontoolssubscribe-param-s: Yɛlmaŋli piibu ni, ka yɛlmaŋli ka piibu ni
apihelp-discussiontoolssubscribe-summary: Piibu ni a nyari tibili zaŋ chaŋ yɛtɔɣa zuɣu
